subject: Football (College)
Traffic Accidents and Safety
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: A freshman offensive lineman for Cincinnati was killed and two freshman receivers were injured in a one-vehicle accident after the Bearcats’ 14-0 win over Miami (Ohio) on Saturday.
snippet: A freshman offensive lineman for Cincinnati was killed and two freshman receivers were injured in a one-vehicle accident after the Bearcats’ 14-0 win over Miami (Ohio) on Saturday.
